hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /mnt export BUILD_ID=$BUILD_ID sudo -E /opt/vappio-util/vp-build $IMAGE_NAME clovr-build echo "Enabling updates and hudson start at boot" buildname=`echo "$BUILD_ID" | sed 's/_/-/'` namepfx="clovr-build-$buildname" mkdir -p $namepfx/shared/user-scripts echo "#!/bin/bash" > $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/01-updaterecipes echo "/opt/vappio-install/vp-bootstrap-install" >> $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/01-updaterecipes echo "#!/bin/bash" > $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/02-starthudson echo "/etc/init.d/hudson start" >> $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/02-starthudson perl -pi -e 's/numvcpus = \S+/numvcpus = "2"/' $namepfx/start_clovr.vmx perl -pi -e 's/memsize = \S+/memsize = "8192"/' $namepfx/start_clovr.vmx tar -cvzf $namepfx.tgz $namepfx || true
